original_title: Yo nimo Kimyou na Monogatari: 2002 Spring Special
overview: Hosted by veteran comedian Tamori, "Bizarre Tales 2002 Spring Special" presents five tales.  1. Mushi Game (Ignore the Game) - starring Uchiyama Rina  2. Okashina Machi (Funny Town) - starring Yanagiba Toshiro  3. Tokage no Shippo (Lizard's Tail) - starring Kashiwabara Takashi  4. Yogisha no Otoko (Man's Night Train) - starring Osugi Ren  5. Manhole - starring Kagawa Teruyuki
title: Tales of the Bizarre: 2002 Spring Special
